note: “[Britain outside the EEC would go into] an old people's home for fading nations … And I do not even think it would be a comfortable or agreeable old people's home. I do not much like the look of some of the prospective wardens. I do not think the food or heating supplies would be very secure. There would be nobody much to pay for renovations. Our old friends would not much want to come and see us… We would find it increasingly difficult to afford to go and see them." Roy Jenkins 1975
